title: I wasted $1,000 on old junk at the Apple Store!
description:
Not everything sold in Apple Stores is cutting edge. Let’s unbox some old, crappy garbage!
If Apple made a toothbrush, it’d be the Laifen Wave (sponsored):
Laifen Store: https://bit.ly/3Tk8Muu
Amazon: https://amzn.to/3Tk9gki
Laifen Wave_ABS ($69.99): https://amzn.to/3Tk9gki
Laifen Wave_Aluminum Alloy ($79.99): https://amzn.to/431MIYS
Laifen Wave_Stainless Steel ($99.99): https://amzn.to/3SXV7bn

Explore the quirky world of outdated and peculiar gadgets still available in the Apple Store! From the ancient USB SuperDrive to the nostalgic 30-pin connector, some of these things have overstayed their welcome. Let's unbox, review, and dissect these relics of a bygone era.

Apple USB SuperDrive (don't buy) - https://amzn.to/432sXk4
LG Blu--ray Writer (you want this one) - https://amzn.to/3wJAQPh
Mac Pro Security Lock Adapter (masochist) - https://amzn.to/3IoatRr
Lightning to USB-3 Camera Adapter - https://amzn.to/3wJB20X
Apple Mac Pro Wheels Kit (great for Teslas) - https://amzn.to/
